    • updatePlayerStatus

      public boolean updatePlayerStatus(Integer id, PlayerStatus newStatus)
      Updates a player's status by accepting a new PlayerStatus object. If the new status differs in either readiness or role from the current status, the player's status is updated, and readiness for all players is canceled.
      Parameters:
      id - the player's id
      newStatus - the new PlayerStatus to apply for the player
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether an update occurred
